entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cape Race
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016
